SEARCH
Package org.example.model.playarea

Class ScoreBoard

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.playarea.ScoreBoard
public class ScoreBoard extends Object
Class representing the scoreboard for the game. Keeps track of player points and tokens.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ScoreBoard()
    Constructs a ScoreBoard and initializes the points and tokens maps.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    void
    addPlayer(Player player)
    Adds a player to the scoreboard, initializing their points to zero.

    Retrieves the points of a given player.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScoreBoard

      public ScoreBoard()
      Constructs a ScoreBoard and initializes the points and tokens maps.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the scoreboard, initializing their points to zero.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to be added.

    • addToken

      public void addToken(String username, Color color) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a new token to the scoreboard, ensuring the color is not already used and there are no more than the maximum number of players.
      Parameters:
      username - The player associated with the token.
      color - The color of the token.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the color is already used or the maximum number of players is exceeded.

    • updatePlayerPoint

      public void updatePlayerPoint(Player player, int point)
      Updates the points of a given player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose points are to be updated.
      point - The new point value.

    • getPlayerPoint

      public int getPlayerPoint(Player player)
      Retrieves the points of a given player. If the player is not present, initializes their points to zero.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose points are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The points of the player.

    • getPoints

      public HashMap<Player,Integer> getPoints()
      Gets the map of all players and their points.
      Returns:
      A hashmap of players and their points.

    • getTokens

      public HashMap<String,Color> getTokens()
      Gets the map of all tokens and their associated players.
      Returns:
      A hashmap of tokens and their associated players.

    • winner

      public Player winner()
      Finds the player with the most points.
      Returns:
      The player with the most points.
